description.brief: Applications that use leJOS to control NXT robots

stack.description: The nxt_lejos_apps stack contains applications that use the API defined by the nxt_lejos stack. The API is provided by either the nxt_lejos_proxy or the nxt_lejos_lcp_proxy package. The current applications include a simple bumper car that needs a robot with differential steering and an ultrasonic sensor, a speech control application that needs the same, and a general purpose GUI monitor for leJOS NXT robots using this API.
